title: More Info »
full_description:
Session 2 program registration is open! - More Details » Date: March 21, 2025
Time: 11:30 am - 5:30 pm

Location: (Get Directions)
YMCA Food Hub

 50 Graham Road West                                
Ithaca, NY 14850 Contact: Larry Snyder Email: lsnyder@ithacaymca.com Since 2020, the YMCA of Ithaca and Tompkins County has sponsored a Neighborhood Food Hub. On Mondays and Fridays from 11:30 am to 5:00 pm, everyone is welcome to stop by and take from a variety of food including fresh produce, dairy, bread, and frozen goods (based on available supply). Sign-in starts at 10:00 AM in the lobby, outside the Food Hub. You do not need to be a member of the YMCA to use the Food Hub. However, we ask that you only take what you need. The Food Hub is supported by the Friendship Donations Network (FDN), the Food Bank of the Southern Tier,  the Ithaca YMCA Annual Campaign, and other donors from the community. If you want to donate food, please bring it to the YMCA Welcome Center. Thank you for helping feed our hometown! Increase energy, decrease stress, prevent illness, maintain a healthy weight, find personal balance, and enjoy quality time with family and friends... at the Y! We combine spirit, mind, and body in an integrated approach to well-being that goes beyond just fitness.                            
Learn More » The Y empowers everyone, no matter who they are or where they’re from, by ensuring access to resources, relationships and opportunities for all to be healthy, learn, connect and have fun. We care about your privacy and will never sell or give your email address to anyone. Copyright © 2025 YMCA of Ithaca and Tompkins County . All Rights Reserved. yBox | 
Login | A Thrive Creation Share your Y experience, and get a chance to win! When you leave your review, you'll join a raffle for:1. A free month of membership2. A $35 Y gift card3. A swag bag including a t-shirt. Use the button to share your story! Leave your Review!

Your gift supports character-building afterschool programs, lifelong wellness, community health and connections, our Food Hub — everything that makes the Y a wonderful place for people to be.                            
Learn More » The Y empowers everyone, no matter who they are or where they’re from, by ensuring access to resources, relationships and opportunities for all to be healthy, learn, connect and have fun. We care about your privacy and will never sell or give your email address to anyone. Copyright © 2025 YMCA of Ithaca and Tompkins County . All Rights Reserved. yBox |
